scripts.deploy:contracts: cd contracts && npx hardhat run scripts/deploy.js --network localhost
scripts.deploy:contracts:testnet: cd contracts && npx hardhat run scripts/deploy.js --network testnet
scripts.deploy:contracts:mainnet: cd contracts && npx hardhat run scripts/deploy.js --network mainnet
scripts.deploy:all: npm run deploy:contracts && npm run deploy:infrastructure
scripts.test: npm run test:contracts && npm run test:sdk && npm run test:integration
scripts.clean: npm run clean:contracts && npm run clean:infrastructure
scripts.clean:infrastructure: cd gateway && npx serverless remove && cd ../plugins/summarizer && npx serverless remove && cd ../meme-generator && npx serverless remove && cd ../nft-appraiser && npx serverless remove
scripts.version:bump: npm version patch && git push && git push --tags
